nodes.text: The Orchid was a hotel located in Drepplin, the capital city of Glova. The Orchid was the only hotel in the city, and thus attracted a wide ranging clientele. The service was excellent, and for those with good contacts in the government, fares are as low as 25 credits per night but the average citizen will have to pay 75-100 credits per night.
The Orchid was attached to a restaurant, Aramand's. The complex was owned and operated by Glova's governor, Tegist Byrg.
